session_id.description: The unique ID of the overall session.

ad_asset_id.description: The unique ID of the ad asset.

ad_pod_id.description: The unique ID of the ad pod.

ad_title.description: The title of the video ad.

ad_position.description: The current index position in seconds of the playhead with respect to the length of the ad.

ad_pod_position.description: Position of the ad asset relative to other assets in the same pod.

total_ad_length.description: The total duration of the current ad asset in seconds.

ad_publisher.description: The ad creator, author, producer, or publisher.

ad_load_type.description: Linear if ads are same for all users.
